question: Which of the following territories conquered by Alauddin Hasan Bahman Shah during the expansion of his rule?
explanation: The Bahmani kingdom was founded by Hasan Gangu, who after coronation assumed the title of Alauddin Hasan Bahman Shah.Â  He conquered the territories of Bidar, Malkhed, Goa, Kolhapur, Telangana and Dabhol.
